mapper.select: select * from program order by id_pgm desc

SELECT p.id_Pgm, p.id_Cate, p.id_Room, p.id_Prof, p.pgm_Name, p.st_Dt, p.end_Dt, p.sugang_St_Dt, p.sugang_End_Dt, p.pgm_Target, p.pgm_Method, p.pgm_Per, p.pgm_Fee, c.cate_Name, r.room_Name, pr.name AS prof_Name FROM Program p JOIN Category c ON p.id_Cate = c.id_Cate JOIN class_room r ON p.id_Room = r.id_Room JOIN Professor pr ON p.id_Prof = pr.id_Prof WHERE p.id_pgm = #{idPgm};
mapper.insert: insert into program (id_pgm, id_cate, id_prof, pgm_name, st_dt, end_dt, sugang_st_dt, sugang_end_dt, pgm_target, id_room, pgm_method, pgm_per, num_of_stu, pgm_fee) values (#{idPgm},#{idCate},#{idProf},#{pgmName},#{stDt},#{endDt},#{sugangStDt},#{sugangEndDt}, #{pgmTarget},#{idRoom},#{pgmMethod},#{pgmPer},0,#{pgmFee})

where id_pgm = #{idPgm}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id_Pgm, p.id_Cate, p.id_Room, p.id_Prof, p.pgm_Name, p.st_Dt, p.end_Dt, p.sugang_St_Dt, p.sugang_End_Dt, p.pgm_Target, p.pgm_Method, p.pgm_Per, p.pgm_Fee, c.cate_Name, r.room_Name, pr.name AS prof_Name FROM Program p JOIN Category c ON p.id_Cate = c.id_Cate JOIN class_room r ON p.id_Room = r.id_Room JOIN Professor pr ON p.id_Prof = pr.id_Prof WHERE p.id_Prof = #{idProf};

SELECT p.id_Pgm, p.id_Cate, p.id_Room, p.id_Prof, p.pgm_Name, p.st_Dt, p.end_Dt, p.sugang_St_Dt, p.sugang_End_Dt, p.pgm_Target, p.pgm_Method, p.pgm_Per, p.pgm_Fee, c.cate_Name, r.room_Name, pr.name AS prof_Name FROM Program p JOIN Category c ON p.id_Cate = c.id_Cate JOIN class_room r ON p.id_Room = r.id_Room JOIN Professor pr ON p.id_Prof = pr.id_Prof WHERE p.id_Prof = #{idProf} AND p.id_Pgm = #{idPgm}
